tools.name: list_todos
tools.description: List all TODO comments in the project source files

directory.description: Directory to search (relative to project root)

tools.name: count_lines
tools.description: Count lines of code in the project

executor.code: find "$PROJECT_ROOT" -name "*.${extension:-ts}" -not -path '*/node_modules/*' -not -path '*/dist/*' | xargs wc -l 2>/dev/null | tail -1 || echo '0 total'

tools.name: git_status
tools.description: Show git status of the project

executor.code: cd "$PROJECT_ROOT" && git status --short 2>/dev/null || echo 'Not a git repository'

tools.name: python_info
tools.description: Display Python version and environment info

executor.code:
import sys
import os
print(f'Python {sys.version}')
print(f'Project: {os.environ.get("PROJECT_ROOT", "unknown")}')
